Pre-Game Insights: The Miami Marlins have been inconsistent in recent times with a decline in seasonal batting averages and on-base percentages relative to the league mean.
The Pittsburgh Pirates have a slightly better batting average and on-base percentage than the Marlins, but have scored 610 runs.
Adam Mazur of the Marlins has a high ERA and WHIP, indicating susceptibility to enabling hitters to get on the bases and cross the plate.
Others: The game is set to take place at Dodger Stadium.
The odds are set with the Pittsburgh Pirates as the favorites at -196 on the moneyline.
The total is set at 8.5, with both OVER and UNDER at -114.
